/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. Cars and motorcycles are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
